  • Method Details

    • unpackJar

      public static void unpackJar(ArrayList<String> whiteListJarPath, String jarPath, String unpackPath) throws IOException
      Unpacking a Jar archive in a given directory
      Parameters:
      whiteListJarPath - whitelist of paths (directories and files) that can be unzipped
      jarPath - path to the Jar archive to be unzipped
      unpackPath - target path where you need to unzip files and folders
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of failure to unpack the Jar file due to path problems

    • getFilesInJarFolder

      public static ArrayList<String> getFilesInJarFolder(String jarPath, String folderPath) throws IOException
      Retrieving a list of file paths in a given folder inside a JAR archive.
      Parameters:
      jarPath - path to the JAR archive.
      folderPath - path to the folder inside the JAR archive.
      Returns:
      a list of file paths.
      Throws:
      IOException - on I/O error.

    • deleteJarFilesFromDirectory

      public static void deleteJarFilesFromDirectory(ArrayList<String> whiteListJarPath, String jarPath, String targetPath) throws IOException
      Removing files from a Jar archive in the target directory
      Parameters:
      whiteListJarPath - whitelist of paths that need to be checked for removal
      jarPath - path to the jar archive with which to compare deletion paths
      targetPath - target path from which files should be deleted
      Throws:
      IOException - in cases of unsuccessful removal
